run.name: Test Run 8/16/2024 - Registration via email
run.description: First test of the module Registration page, Registration via email and password

test.title: Create an account with valid email and password

step.expected: The registration page correctly opened ![](index.php?/attachments/get/7c481b9b-3ee2-4020-a9fc-3c0289ce1252)

step.content:
Enter test email and password:
Email: appstructusertest@gmail.com Password: Appstructusertest12345!%
step.expected: The test email and password appear correctly in the input fields

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
Registration is complete. A letter about account creation was sent to the test email
The registration page correctly opened ![](index.php?/attachments/get/1ff61c1d-6890-4ebb-9c5c-2ed7f6abd9cb)

step.content:
Enter test email and password:
Email: appstructusertest@gmail.com Password: Appstructusertest12345!%
step.expected: The test email and password appear correctly in the input fields

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
Registration is complete. A letter about account creation was sent to the test email
step.actual: User registration via email and password was completed - the service workspace was opened, but the registration email was not sent to the test email - the inbox was empty. ![](index.php?/attachments/get/d014bbd0-ece7-49a3-8726-aa679a1ac5d1)

test.title: Log out of the account

custom.preconds: Be a logged in user (see test case C1 “Create an account with valid email and password with clicking the ‘Terms and Conditions’ checkbox”).

step.content: Find the Unlogin button in the User Profile and click it.
step.expected: Unlogging was successful. The registration page opened https://appstruct.cloud/signup

change.comment: The logout was successful. The user was redirected to the https://appstruct.cloud/login

step.content: Find the Unlogin button in the User Profile and click it.
step.expected: Unlogging was successful. The registration page opened https://appstruct.cloud/signup
step.actual: The logout was successful. The user was redirected to the https://appstruct.cloud/login ![](index.php?/attachments/get/4ac050d4-2548-4939-8dbd-f00d296dbf2a)

change.comment:
Press the dropdown menu near the user icon (1). Select the Sing Out menu item (2).
![](index.php?/attachments/get/faa3d7e0-34c0-41f6-8349-522331f1382a)

test.title: Create an account with the data of an already registered test user

custom.preconds: The registration page https://appstruct.cloud/signup is open ![](index.php?/attachments/get/f20e108a-1858-43ab-89a3-bbcdf7a62f57)

step.content:
Enter test email and password:
Email: appstructusertest@gmail.com Password: Appstructusertest12345!%
step.expected: The test email and password appear correctly in the input fields

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
The registration was not successful

change.comment:
Registration failed.
The text tooltip “User already exists with this email” appeared below the password field. The pop-up “Error Sing Up” appeared at the bottom of the browser page.

step.content:
Enter test email and password:
Email: appstructusertest@gmail.com Password: Appstructusertest12345!%
step.expected: The test email and password appear correctly in the input fields

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
The registration was not successful
step.actual:
Registration failed.
The text tooltip &ldquo;User already exists with this email&rdquo; appeared below the password field. The pop-up &ldquo;Error Sing Up&rdquo; appeared at the bottom of the browser page.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/70dffb5a-89e7-485e-97e0-9df9e2a24d3d)

test.title: Create an account with invalid email and password with clicking the "Terms and Conditions" checkbox

custom.preconds: The registration page https://appstruct.cloud/signup is open ![](index.php?/attachments/get/1147582d-27f5-4bd2-9ec7-63a8896399d5)

step.content: Enter invalid data in the fields: email abra@kadabra.ppp and password 11111111111
step.expected: Invalid data is confirmed by the tooltips that appear "Provide a valid email" and "Password must be at least 12 characters"

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
The registration was not successful

step.content: Enter invalid data in the fields: email abra@kadabra.ppp and password 11111111111
step.expected: Invalid data is confirmed by the tooltips that appear "Provide a valid email" and "Password must be at least 12 characters"
step.actual:
The email abra@kadabra.ppp, which should be invalid, was recognized by the system as valid.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/25a7bee9-9e42-4928-a44d-92c34e9c9b52)

step.content: Tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: A blue checkmark appeared in the "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions" checkbox
The registration was not successful

test.title: Create an account with invalid email and password without clicking the "Terms and Conditions" checkbox

custom.preconds: Go to the registration page https://appstruct.cloud/signup ![](index.php?/attachments/get/a0bceef4-7184-4122-ba9e-398b4247032d)

step.content: Enter invalid data in the fields: email abra@kadabra.ppp and password 11111111111
step.expected: Invalid data is confirmed by the tooltips that appear "Provide a valid email" and "Password must be at least 12 characters"

step.content: Do not tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: No blue checkmark in the “I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions” checkbox
The registration was not successful

step.content: Enter invalid data in the fields: email abra@kadabra.ppp and password 11111111111
step.expected: Invalid data is confirmed by the tooltips that appear "Provide a valid email" and "Password must be at least 12 characters"
step.actual:
The email abra@kadabra.ppp, which should be invalid, was recognized by the system as valid.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/7b2ee65d-c010-46c7-b01e-744bb353913f)

step.content: Do not tick the checkbox "I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions"
step.expected: No blue checkmark in the “I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions” checkbox
The registration was not successful

test.title: Create an account with invalid email abra@kadabra.ppp

custom.preconds: The registration page https://appstruct.cloud/signup is open. ![](index.php?/attachments/get/b96cf3c8-2466-4b18-96f9-ddbc8e276544) Password testtest12345 has been entered. The “I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions” checkbox is ticked

step.expected: Under the mail field, it should show a tooltip that says "Provide a valid email"
The registration was not successful. The Create account button must be inactive
Under the mail field, it should show a tooltip that says "Provide a valid email"
step.actual:
The email abra@kadabra.ppp, which should be invalid, was recognized by the system as valid.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/2bf23c8f-58b6-4164-9f0a-f99ec11e37fd)

step.expected: The registration was not successful. The Create account button must be inactive

The registration was not successful. The Create account button must be inactive

The 11-character password 11111111111 was identified by the system as invalid.
